title: Assistant Athletics Trainer - Baseball - College Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for daily health care needs for menÂ’s baseball; including attending all baseball games and practices and travel to all away events. Responsible for assisting with supervision and care...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
